... check to end this module, without further actions
//D. NEW DISPUTE AND CLIENT USES INTERNET
//skip these tests because the prog should do nothing
//E. NEW DISPUTE AND CLIENT DOES NOT USE INTERNET
//INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER = '' or = '000' or <>'' and no DCDU row
If GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 122) and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE<date() and IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED<date() then do not write the IDUN row.
//INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER = '' or = '000' or <>'' and no CCDU row
If GSET_YESNO = Y (GSET_ID = 122) and INVO_SCHEDULEDATE < date() and IDUN_DUNNDATESCHED < date() then do not write the IDUN row.
//INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER = '' or = '000' or <>'' and no DCDU row
//INVO_CODLASTDUNNINGLETTER = '' or = '000' or <>'' and no CCDU row
